channel.title: [508] Attack styles and experiance gain?
channel.description:
posted this twice now no replies yet :S
alright so here it goes, using mezzy scape source its kinda messy seeing as when you train with a scimitar using block will give you attack, str and defence xp while training with chop "accurate" it will only give you defence xp and so on
what is the file i need to look for in order to change what attack style gives you experience in what skill?
again if you didnt read the title this is a 508 server

item.title: [508] Attack styles and experiance gain?
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

ive looked through both couldnt seem to find it :S

probably cause i was looking for something similar to a 317 method, only been around 508s bout a week now

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Attack styles and experiance gain?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

ActionButtons.java to set the attack style.

PlayerCombat and NPCPlayerCombat for exp.
